channel.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.roflcat.com/images/cats/270911970_db35fdd4ca.jpg[/img][/center]
Yes, what's so bad about Deltascape? Don't go start acting like a retard; I really want to know. I looked around the forums to quote people saying that Deltascape sucks.
inb4 sucks
[quote="theoke, post:1208, topic:226498"]this sucks[/quote]
[quote="owner flame!, post:11, topic:294956"]delta sucks its dupe able all delta are dupeable[/quote]
[quote="johno2, post:1103, topic:226498"]I don't no why people use Delta... It's shit. Why don't you just get a blank source, make it stable, add stuff and host?[/quote]
[quote="Liquid Magic, post:5, topic:330336"]Delta is a failure of a source, first of all you want to actually call your server "work" use Dodian, or atleast reprogram your server to a new computer language such as the famous c++...
Homiescape can't take rep either.[/quote]
[quote="`Lewk_, post:1053, topic:226498"]Why can't this server die? It's horrible.[/quote]
[quote="butterscaperules, post:1055, topic:226498"]im so tired of this server its not even good[/quote]
[quote="butterscaperules, post:1065, topic:226498"]this seerver sucks why dont the mods lock it[/quote]

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

It’s bad because everyone thinks it’s bad. People are jealous of each others achievements and what others have done, they haven’t ever achieved something that is as big as Deltascape was, so they must bash it.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

All servers coded from delta scape are the same, moved objects and new shops. Delta is probably the easiest server to set up and get a good fast player base because it is all done for you.

Read full topic

LMFAO!! i personally like Delta. alot of good servers have been coded from it. idk what ya’ll think but whatever (:[/quote]

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Deltascape is easy to code in, but you get a lot of ‘stability, uptime, convention’ lovers even though they spend all day on the forums complaining at others code and not releasing any of their own. Everyone has their own seperate opinion, and deltascape did not become so well known at first because it was ‘shit’. It’s out dated, why are we still going on about it?
Blank bases, or cleaned bases, are the way forward.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

CoonHunter:

a ‘Plug-N-Play’ server, get Blurr’s client, and deltascape source, and your ready to host.

Damn, I hate all the Bluurrs client out there; the gameframe sucks and like the dead codes in a Deltascape source, there are too many sprites which some are not being loaded into the game.

Anyways, what would be fun to see in a server?

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

The code is incredibly messy and horribly written, very inefficient programing, the only good side of it, is that it only takes the knowledge of a 2nd grader to get up and running a full scale generic piece of shit server. :]

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Unless you can justify why you DeltaScape is a bad server then don’t post because it isn’t worth it.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Ventrozip, post:49, topic:333390”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=429797.msg3193834#msg3193834 date=1272567323]
What’s the point of criticizing Deltascape when none of the criticizers here are able to write a base/server that is better than it?
[/quote]
Obviously there are people here that can. And obviously no-one wants to. I wish I could but I don’t know Java. C++ all the way :).[/quote]
I’m pretty sure all the people that criticized Delta on this thread can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

CoonHunter:

Deltascape is a bad source, in my opinion, because of how common it is, and how much dead code it has in it.

eh, devolution and dodian also both had an amazing amount of dead code.

CoonHunter:

The main reason that alot of people even use Delta, is because its what I call, a ‘Plug-N-Play’ server, get Blurr’s client, and deltascape source, and your ready to host.

yea, thats the main reason i think people are starting to get annoyed, because people will go, download a server, and then change name and host.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Deltascape is a bad source, in my opinion, because of how common it is, and how much dead code it has in it. A cleaned out Deltascape source could be a decient base to work from, because it is already setup, and new RSPS programmers can learn, while hosting. I personally used ReapageScape as my first ever server, along with the Sk1ttlesv43 V2 client (I still use the client, but it is highly edited). The main reason that alot of people even use Delta, is because its what I call, a ‘Plug-N-Play’ server, get Blurr’s client, and deltascape source, and your ready to host.

If you need me to clear this up, please, PM me quoting this, and I will do my best.

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @Ventrozip Ventrozip
item.description:
@Ventrozip wrote:

Jc22493:

What’s the point of criticizing Deltascape when none of the criticizers here are able to write a base/server that is better than it?

Obviously there are people here that can. And obviously no-one wants to. I wish I could but I don’t know Java. C++ all the way :).

Read full topic

item.title: What's bad about Deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @Ventrozip Ventrozip
item.description:
@Ventrozip wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:42, topic:333390”][quote author=Ventrozip link=topic=429797.msg3193440#msg3193440 date=1272500962]
The fact Delta is just a leech of Devolution 7. All the private server sources are shit. The only good private server source is Hyperion or Rs2dv or a completely BLANK source. Any other source as a base and your leeching. It doesn’t even matter how blank it is. If its a PURE blank source then thats a different story, a blank source would be a source with nothing. No game. In which case you’d code a game out of it. That game wouldn’t necessarily have to be RuneScape based.
[/quote]

Please show me any Hyperion server being host other then Apocalypsism or w.e -.-

Apo 474, is laggy with 100 people on. And harry is a great coder.

Hyperion is not the god of server sources.[/quote]
You should re-read my post. Actually READ it, stop scimming. You will notice I never called Hyperion the god of all sources.

Read full topic
